home.placeholder:
Enter your task here.
e.g., "take shower"
home.noTasks: No tasks yet. Here are some examples:
home.pleaseEnterTask: Please enter your task. AI will call you to remind!
home.timePastConfirm: The selected time has passed. Set it for tomorrow at the same time?
home.testVersionNote: Please note that the phone-call reminder feature is only available on iOS or Android. If you are interested, you can click below to request a test version, and the developer will send you an email.
home.requestSent: Request Sent! We'll contact you soon.
home.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
home.submitFailed: Failed to submit request. Please try again.
stats.completeTasksHint: Complete some tasks in the Home tab!
stats.routineStreaksHint: Your routine streaks will be tracked here.
stats.exampleStreaksHint: Here are example streaks (some days kept, some missed):
profile.nameHint: Lumi will call you by this name
profile.makerIntro: Hey, I'm Miko. I have ADHD and I'm honestly tired of habit apps that make me feel guilty for being human.
profile.makerAdhd: I'm trying to fix the "start strong, quit in a week" cycle, but I don't have all the answers yet.
profile.makerDream: If you're in the SF Bay Area, let me buy you a coffee! ☕️
profile.makerHope: I have nothing to sell. I just want to hear your story and learn how you handle this stuff.
profile.feedbackTitle: Trying to help ADHDers actually start tasks.
profile.feedbackBody: I'm struggling to figure out the fine line between a "helpful partner" and an "annoying nag." If you need a push to get started but hate being bossed around, how do you handle this? I'd love your advice.
profile.saveFailed: Failed to save name. Please try again.
profile.feedbackFailed: Failed to send feedback. Please try again.
auth.signInPrompt: Sign in or create an account to continue
auth.termsAgree: By continuing, you agree to our
onboarding.signInDesc: Sign in with Google or email to save tasks and rewards.
onboarding.emailLoginHint: Enter email and password after redirect
onboarding.termsAgree: By signing in, you agree to Lumi's
onboarding.appleLoginFailed: Apple login failed, please try again
language.title: Lumi's Voice Language
language.description: Choose the language Lumi speaks. Auto-detect will match your speech.
uiLanguage.title: App Language
uiLanguage.description: Choose the language for app interface and text.
feedback.title: Thank you for your feedback!
feedback.interviewInvite: If you're open to a 15-minute chat, I'd love to buy you a coffee ($5) as a thank you. Your insights mean the world to me!
feedback.emailPrompt: Please leave your email so I can contact you for the coffee chat!
feedback.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
feedback.thanksSoon: Thanks! I'll reach out to you soon.
urgency.emptyWarning: You need to enter the task you want to do
leaderboard.comingSoonHint: The leaderboard experience is on the way. Stay tuned!
